description:
### 11.235 shuffleplanes

Reorder and/or duplicate video planes.

It accepts the following parameters:

**map0**

    The index of the input plane to be used as the first output plane. 

**map1**

    The index of the input plane to be used as the second output plane. 

**map2**

    The index of the input plane to be used as the third output plane. 

**map3**

    The index of the input plane to be used as the fourth output plane. 

The first plane has the index 0. The default is to keep the input unchanged.
name: shuffleplanes

options.description: The index of the input plane to be used as the first output plane.
options.name: map0

options.description: The index of the input plane to be used as the second output plane.
options.name: map1

options.description: The index of the input plane to be used as the third output plane.
options.name: map2

options.description: The index of the input plane to be used as the fourth output plane.
options.name: map3
